results.content: Cool course. Dynamic, humorous. Examples of animations in codepen are very handy. The eyes from the last chapter were my favorite.

results.content: Great stuff...  I need to create a bunch of simpler animations and got ton of info on how to do it, .. other parts of the course I won't need right away, but it opens the door to have a reference to create other sort of animations.. I think I am ready to jump in gsap and create some disruption on the web....

results.content: Great course! I liked the thoughtful design and structure of the lessons. Capacious theory and interesting practical examples. All these illusions, interactive animations and of course the eyes! The humor lifted the spirits. And all these things with the code in the editor - it arrives, appears, highlights, stands out, turns over, dissolves, I wonder how much time was spent on this?

response.content:
Greetings! 
Thank you for your feedback. 
Such development is a very laborious process. More than 2000 working hours were spent on this course.

results.content_html: Great course! I liked the thoughtful design and structure of the lessons. Capacious theory and interesting practical examples. All these illusions, interactive animations and of course the eyes! The humor lifted the spirits. And all these things with the code in the editor - it arrives, appears, highlights, stands out, turns over, dissolves, I wonder how much time was spent on this?
